Text:
Thats due to environmental conditions. 

Theres no gene that makes one turn to drugs or alcohol. It's possible it could influence it but the environment would have to act as the trigger. 

Raise a child in a catholic family and he will be catholic. Raise him a muslim family and he will be muslim. It doesn't matter where he is from. 

So to summerize, it's a known fact that your facts are bullshit.
